about:
Caitlin was born and raised on the east end of Long Island, NY. She could sing and match pitch at 8 months old (it’s on video!) and would sing, dance, and act for all of her stuffed animals, family, and neighbors in the basement and backyard. Because of this, her mom started a summer theater camp called, Backyard Theatre, which Caitlin now co-directs if she’s not on the road performing!

Caitlin continued to pursue music and dance throughout grade school, then moved on to earn a BFA in Musical Theatre from Pace University in Manhattan.

Caitlin has been fortunate enough to perform in numerous regional venues across the country. When not performing, she is a freelance Wellness Advocate/Holistic Health Coach with doTERRA, an essential oils company.

Caitlin is based in NYC where she lives happily with her boyfriend, Christopher and their mini pin, Kya!

posts.content: Caitlin is the headline singer for Titanic's Spectacular Fireworks Display In Tennessee!
Caitlin will be playing Lucy in the national tour of A Charlie Brown Christmas!
